data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zupolini, Lucas L., Magalhães, Tatiana, Pileggi, Leonardo G., Mantelatto, Fernando L. (2017): Taxonomic revision of the speckled crabs, genus Arenaeus Dana, 1851 (Brachyura: Portunidae) based on morphological and molecular data. Zootaxa 4273 (3): 362-380, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4273.3.3|47 occurrences
